name: 鬼畜大冒险 Gui Chu Da Mao Xian
name_original: 鬼畜大冒险 Gui Chu Da Mao Xian
description:
"Gui Chu Da Mao Xian" is a text-based visual novel with some RPG elements.
As the story progresses, you will collaborate with and fight against Gui Chu stars. Remember,
collaborating and fighting is just a means to survive, not an answer to the secrets in this world.
Your mission is to figure out the truth of this world.
You cannot leave the world, unless you reveal the truth of it.[story Introduction]"again and Again……"
"failure Is Always Possible, Don't Give Up."
"don't stop Before You Reach the End, Okay?"
A weird game, a fierce opponent, an endless odyssey... What is this all about? What is it for my opponents to come here?
Swimming coach, swearing Guevara, brothers and sisters, Zhuge Liang, Wang Situ... Why did people who had never met before came to this place at the same time? Why are they fighting against each other?
Who is the man behind all of this? Why did they bring me here?
Perhaps the only way to answer these questions is to win this game... to be the last one standing upright...
"Yes, kid... If you want to find the ultimate secret... then prove yourself in the world."
The game... now begins!


  • --Features ---
Chinese characteristics, unique Gui Chu game culture artworks.
Survive the battle royale under the story background, in fun battle mode.
A total of more than 30 Gui Chu stars appear in the game and may become your teammates.
Up to four endings, a wealth of branch choices, and a variety of odd endings.
